import axios from'axios';const BASE_URL='https://api.sleeper.app/v1';export const sleeperApi={// Get league information
getLeague:async leagueId=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/league/").concat(leagueId));return response.data;},// Get league rosters
getLeagueRosters:async leagueId=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/league/").concat(leagueId,"/rosters"));return response.data;},// Get league users
getLeagueUsers:async leagueId=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/league/").concat(leagueId,"/users"));return response.data;},// Get current week
getCurrentWeek:async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/state/nfl"));return response.data.week;},// Get matchups for a specific week
getMatchups:async(leagueId,week)=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/league/").concat(leagueId,"/matchups/").concat(week));return response.data;},// Get league transactions
getLeagueTransactions:async leagueId=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/league/").concat(leagueId,"/transactions/1"));return response.data;},// Get all NFL players
getAllPlayers:async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/players/nfl"));return response.data;}};
